particle Module¶

class particle.Dat(N1=1, N2=1, initial_value=None, name=None)[source]¶

Base class to hold floating point properties of particles, creates N1*N2 array with given initial value.

Parameters:
  • N1 – (Integer) First dimension.
  • N2 – (Integer) Second dimension.
  • initial_value – (Float) Value to initialise array with, default 0.0.
  • name – (string) Collective name of stored vars eg positions.
Dat()[source]¶

Returns entire data array.

ctypes_data()¶

Return ctypes-pointer to data.

dattype¶

Returns type of particle dat.

name¶

Returns name of particle dat.

ncomp¶

Return number of components.

npart¶

Return number of particles.

set_val(val)¶
class particle.ScalarDat(initial_value=None, name=None)¶

Bases: particle.Dat

Base class to hold a single floating point property.

Parameters:
  • initial_value – (Float) Value to initialise array with, default 0.0.
  • name – (string) Collective name of stored vars eg positions.
Dat()¶

Returns stored data as numpy array.

ctypes_data()¶

Return ctypes-pointer to data.

dattype¶

Returns type of particle dat.

name¶

Returns name of particle dat.
